content: जाड्यं [जडस्य भावः ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Coldness, frigidity. {@--2@} Apathy, sluggishness, inactivity. {@--3@} Dulness of intellect, folly, stupidity; तज्जाड्यं वसुधाधिपस्य <ls>Bh. 2. 15</ls>; जाड्यं धियो हरति <ls n="Bh.">2. 23</ls>; जाड्यं ह्रीमति गण्यते <ls n="Bh. 2.">54.</ls> {@--4@} Tastelessness of the tongue.
